name: places/ChIJG0iDuZ1ZwokRVmWmuUhTQ54
adrFormatAddress: 1157 3rd Ave, New York, NY 10065, USA

originalText.text: Incredible service. Mary oversaw my recovery with so much care, patience, and encouragement—I feel more confident going up and down my walk-up than I did before I broke my ankle! Special shout-out to Sabrina, Letti, and Gabby for always making sure my form was correct, and to Davis for covering stepping in when Mary was unavailable (and to Terri for always choosing the best music!). I hope I never injure myself like that again, but I know where to go if I do.

originalText.text: Ricardo has helped me work through some tough and persistent running related injuries. He and all the staff at spear are the most knowledgeable and skilled therapists. He works with me through every injury so that I can safely achieve my athletic goals. I highly recommend this spear location, all the staff including receptionists and aides are wonderful!

He works with me through every injury so that I can safely achieve my athletic goals. I highly recommend this spear location, all the staff including receptionists and aides are wonderful!

originalText.text: If you want the best of the best, go to Spear on Third Ave!! An unfortunate kickball accident left me with a broken ankle and broken spirits. Mary (and Sabrina) worked her PT magic and I am happy to say I am kickballing again! Sarah, Mary, Kateri, Sabrina and the entire staff are extremely friendly, knowledgeable, professional and welcoming. I genuinely enjoyed coming in for every appointment. You can tell all the therapists truly care about their patients and are passionate about helping people feel their best.

text.text: If you want the best of the best, go to Spear on Third Ave!! An unfortunate kickball accident left me with a broken ankle and broken spirits. originalText.text: My experience at this Spear location exceeded all expectations. Contact with my doctor left me with very bleak outlook on my exercise-related injury, but Kateri had faith that I could make a full recovery through PT. Through her expertise and care, I was able to make that full recovery around a very packed work schedule. She spent time getting to know me on a personal level and genuinely cared about my well-being. I could not be more appreciative of the time spent with their staff (Sarah, Ricardo, etc.) and fellow patients. Highly recommend choosing this location.

originalText.text: I never had physical therapy for anything before but Emma is an amazing physical therapist. She showed me exercises for tennis elbow that I have very sweet very nice and made me feel at home and an incredible facility. I recommend it to anyone. Thank you Emma for your advice am I continue therapy at Spear!!!!
